id.description: Unique identifier for the OTP record

email.description: Email address the OTP was sent to

expires_at.description: When the OTP expires (typically 10 minutes after sent_at)

consumed.description: Whether this OTP has been used

consumed_at.description: When the OTP was consumed (if consumed is true)

ip_hash.description: Hashed IP address of the requester for rate limiting

invite_code.description: Associated invite code if this is for invite-only signup
